_header: Good maidens should we make in mind
Title(s): De sancta Christina virgine et martire
_description: De sancta Christina virgine et martire

BLHar4196.First Lines: Gude maydins suld we mak in mindeand of saint cristine carp bi kinde…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And so with crist ay lifs Cristyngod graunt vs to þat life to wyn
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: De sancta Cristina virgine & martire (rubric, f. 162rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 93-6.
